cards.flavor_text: In the wake of Niv-Mizzet's disappearance, Ral found himself leading the guild. He had dreamed of this day, but couldn't help feeling like a pawn in someone else's game.

cards.name: Deadly Visit
cards.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

cards.name: Divine Visitation
cards.oracle_text: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.
cards.flavor_text: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.

cards.name: Doom Whisperer
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, trample
Pay 2 life: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
cards.flavor_text: The sound of every twisted secret tempts you to hear another.

cards.name: Douser of Lights
cards.flavor_text: The party of Rakdos revelers cackled and capered as the thing approached. It hissed, and they jabbed their torches at it, giggling when it recoiled. Then, one by one, the torches went out—and the screaming began.

cards.name: Garrison Sergeant
cards.oracle_text: Garrison Sergeant has double strike as long as you control a Gate.
cards.flavor_text: In the Legion, no flagpole is merely decorative, and every ceremonial sword bears an edge.

cards.name: Gruesome Menagerie
cards.oracle_text: Choose a creature card with converted mana cost 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with converted mana costs 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text:
"Variety is also the spice of death."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

cards.name: Hellkite Whelp
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Hellkite Whelp attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.
cards.flavor_text:
"They play by spitting fire at each other. Don't be offended if one gives you a love-scorch."
—Esfir, Rakdos dragon wrangler

cards.name: Hypothesizzle
cards.oracle_text: Draw two cards. Then you may discard a nonland card. When you do, Hypothesizzle deals 4 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor_text:
"It's like blowing up an arcane library in a thermobaric explosion. But in a good way."
—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

card_faces.name: Integrity
card_faces.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Intervention
card_faces.oracle_text: Intervention deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Intrusive Packbeast
cards.oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Intrusive Packbeast enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.
cards.flavor_text: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

cards.name: Join Shields
cards.oracle_text: Untap all creatures you control. They gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
cards.flavor_text: "We are the shield that never breaks, the bough that never burns, the song that can never be silenced."

cards.name: Kraul Foragers
cards.oracle_text: Undergrowth — When Kraul Foragers enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text:
Feed on food, you eventually rot. Feed on rot, you live forever.
—Kraul saying

cards.name: Kraul Swarm
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
{2}{B}, Discard a creature card: Return Kraul Swarm from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: The hive has a long memory. It knows how every member has died, and tow home it owes the grudge.

cards.name: Omnispell Adept
cards.oracle_text: {2}{U}, {T}: You may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor_text: She memorized every arcane text in the Ismeri Library by the time she was sixteen. Now she quizzes sphinxes in her spare time.

cards.name: Ral, Izzet Viceroy
cards.oracle_text:
+1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
−3: Ral, Izzet Viceroy deals damage to target creature equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this emblem deals 4 damage to any target and you draw two cards."

cards.name: Ral's Dispersal
cards.oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Ral, Caller of Storms, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.name: Rosemane Centaur
cards.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Vigilance
cards.flavor_text: "I long for peaceful times, when I may tend to my garden instead of our borders."

card_faces.name: Statue
card_faces.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment.

cards.name: Street Riot
cards.oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample.
cards.flavor_text:
"They said obey and you'll be happy. They said you'll be safe. But we're not safe. We're not happy. And we will not obey."
—Domri Rade

cards.name: Trostani Discordant
cards.oracle_text:
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Trostani Discordant enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.
At the beginning of your end step, each player gains control of all creatures they own.

cards.name: Underrealm Lich
cards.oracle_text:
If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards of your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.
cards.flavor_text: "You've strayed, overworlder."

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

cards.oracle_text: Return up to three target multicolored cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Vivid Revival.

cards.flavor_text: The problem isn't the indrik's enthusiasm, it's Ravnica's lack of guardrails.

Trample
Whenever Book Devourer deals combat damage to a player, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor_text:

Flying

cards.flavor_text:
